video.title: The Hunt with John Walsh
video.synopsis: Join the quest for justice with this reality series, which profiles some of the country's most-wanted crooks and the crimes of which they are accused.

episodes.synopsis: An abusive husband goes on the lam in the mountains after he allegedly murders his wife and their two children in their home.
episodes.title: Murder in the Mountains

episodes.synopsis: A former soldier escapes custody after being caught with child pornography, and an accused pedophile shoots it out with police.
episodes.title: The Enemy Next Door

episodes.synopsis: After brutally slaying his entire family and torching their bodies, a former diplomat flees overseas, where he eludes authorities for decades.
episodes.title: Family Annihilator

episodes.synopsis: A troubled ex-Marine fires on police and vanishes into the woods without a trace, and a drunk driver removes his tracking device and vanishes.
episodes.title: Under the Influence

episodes.synopsis: A trusted neighbor disappears after facing multiple charges of child molestation, and new evidence in an old case leads to a manhunt for the suspect.
episodes.title: Point Blank Murder

episodes.synopsis: Suspected of letting 11 undocumented immigrants perish in an overheated rail car, an accused human trafficker goes on the run from authorities.
episodes.title: Trafficking in Death

episodes.synopsis: The leader of a small cult flees overseas after he's accused of sexually abusing the underage daughters of many of his followers.
episodes.title: Preaching Lies

episodes.synopsis: Parents of an abducted boy keep the search for their son alive after more than two decades, and extremists help mortgage con men flee the law.
episodes.title: Justice Denied
